cause.description:
This cause is designed to create public support, instill pride, foster awareness, and raise money to help support all people who practice consensual alternative sexualities including, but not limited to, BDSM and polyamory.
1. BDSM and similar alternative sexualities are positive ways of life when practiced in a safe, sane, loving, and consensual environment.
2. BDSM and similar alternative sexualities should, under no circumstance, be stigmatized and persecuted by the rest of society.
cause.mission: To garner support for, promote awareness of, and foster a better understanding of BDSM.
cause.name: The Project to Promote Sexual Freedom
